# controlPointBuffer

**Instance Property**

A buffer that contains curve control points.

## Declaration

```swift
var controlPointBuffer: (any MTLBuffer)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You provide control points in the format that matches the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLAccelerationStructureCurveGeometryDescriptor/controlPointFormat] property. This property needs to have a non-nil value when you build an acceleration structure.
